title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The bug report is about the MRU (Most Recently Used) file list not being persisted between sessions. The files appear in the File menu MRU list during the current session but do not appear in the MRU list when the workbench is restarted. It is noted that the files should be persisted between sessions. Additionally, it is mentioned that the implementation should use IPersistableElement and not peek into the underlying resource via IEditorInput.
OB: During the current session, the files appear in the File menu MRU list.
EB: After restarting the workbench, the files should still appear in the File menu MRU list.
SR:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
